articles.title: Wegovy: Weight-loss drug firm becomes Europe's most valuable - BBC
articles.description: Shares rose after the Danish pharmaceutical giant Novo Nordisk launched the popular drug in the UK.
articles.content:
The maker of weight-loss drug, Wegovy, has become Europe's most valuable firm dethroning the French luxury conglomerate LVMH.
Shares rose after the Danish pharmaceutical giant, Novo Nordisk, launche… [+1634 chars]

articles.title: ISRO + ESA= India's Sun mission successful as Aditya-L1 has European friends - Hindustan Times
articles.description: ISRO and ESA have been working on the Aditya-L1 mission to evaluate its operations and challenges.
articles.content: The Indian Space Research Organisation (ISRO) has back-to-back missions lined up for the extraterrestrial exploration, with the latest being the Aditya-L1 mission that set-off to study the Sun. The p… [+1877 chars]
